Title: No Man Left Behind
Description:
I sent recon out over an hour ago and none of them have reported back. And now these damned hounds are pouring out of the chasm.

I don't know what's going on down there, but I'm not going anywhere till I get my men back.

I want you to head in there and find them, $n, preferably while they are still alive.
ObjectivesText: Rescue 5 SI:7 Rangers in Ragefire Chasm.
RewardText:
That's all that survived?

The Horde is going to pay for this in blood.
